You've unlocked all the Medallion torches this week, Guardian!

Continue depositing Medallions at the podium to earn gear and contribute toward your class's standing.
displayProperties.name: Guardian Games: Medallion Battalion

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest progresses automatically on the weekly reset.

displayProperties.description:
Collect Guardian Games Medallions and deposit them at the podium in the Tower to earn points. 

Earning points beyond this threshold will unlock the Platinum Medallion Torch in the Tower. Light it to earn rewards and a special glow for your character that lasts until the weekly reset.
displayProperties.name: Guardian Games: Medallion Battalion

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest progresses automatically on the weekly reset.

displayProperties.description:
Land final blows of any kind in Nightfalls and the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive playlists. 

Completing Nightfalls with faster finish times grants additional progress. 

Guardian Games: Training or Competitive playlists and Nightfall runs at Legend or higher difficulty grant the most efficient progress.

This card can't be reacquired if abandoned.
displayProperties.name: Timeless Performance

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Guardian Games

setData.questStepSummary: Complete this card to earn a Platinum Medallion for your class.

displayProperties.description:
Redeem Guardian Games Medallions for powerful rewards. 

Platinum Medallions = 15 points
Gold Medallions = 5 points
Silver Medallions = 2 points
Bronze Medallions = 1 point
displayProperties.name: Carpe Podium

displayProperties.description:
Get Solar, Arc, Void, or Stasis final blows in Survival, Trials, or Iron Banner. Any Trials final blows grant additional progress.

This card can't be reacquired if abandoned.
displayProperties.name: Competitive Conduit

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Guardian Games

2517057398.displaySource: By the elements, you will smite them.

setData.questStepSummary: Complete this card to earn a Platinum Medallion for your class.

displayProperties.description:

Defeating combatants with Hand Cannons, Bows, or precision damage grants more progress. 

Completing activities and opening locked chests grants significantly more progress.

This card can't be reacquired if abandoned.
displayProperties.name: Pin Pointed
